sec.p: The essential oil from Zanthoxylum monogynum leaves was dissolved in dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) to a final concentration of 10.0 mg/mL, diluted in RPMI medium containing 10% fetal calf serum ranging from 100.0 to 0 µg/mL and incubated with 1 × 10 4 cells in a 96-well plate (Corning, New York, NY, USA). After 18 h of incubation, cell viability was measured using the Cell Proliferation Kit I (MTT) (Sigma, Gillingham, UK), an MTT-based colorimetric assay [ 19]. Readings were made in a plate reader at 570 nm. All experiments were performed in triplicates.
